articles.content: So far in 2020, teams have been playing for their season records. Games over the first three weekends of May will still count towards overall win-loss records. Actual tournament matches won’t, but the top four squads in each region will earn bonus wins toward… [+1569 chars]

articles.title: Nintendo reveals 160,000 accounts were breached over the weekend - WLKY Louisville
articles.description: Over the past month, users on social media were complaining of missing funds from their Nintendo accounts and, in some cases, seeing their money being used to buy Fortnite's virtual currency, V-Bucks.
articles.content:
Nintendo revealed Friday that 160,000 accounts were breached since the beginning of April, by hackers using others' Nintendo Network IDs without permission.
The company announced users will no longer need to use these IDs to log into their accounts, and that… [+1762 chars]

articles.author: Isabel Togoh
articles.title: WhatsApp Viral Message Forwarding Drops 70% After New Limits To Stop Coronavirus Misinformation - Forbes
articles.description: Earlier this month, WhatsApp stopped users from forwarding a message more than once to stop rumours about coronavirus going viral.
articles.content:
WhatsApp has seen a 70% drop in the number of viral forwarded messages being sent, three weeks after the Facebook-own messaging app imposed a limit on shared messages to halt the spread of coronavirus misinformation.

articles.title: Microsoft patches Teams vulnerability that allowed for account takeover just by viewing a GIF - BetaNews
articles.description: A security flaw in Microsoft Teams made it possible for attackers to take over accounts just by getting a victim to view a GIF. The vulnerability stemmed from the way in which Teams handles images and could allow for account takeovers and data theft.
articles.content:
